---

translations.zh-hant: @@untranslatable_placeholder_58cfcc64

segments.source_content: This Week In React #113: React source code, SOLID, Remix, Docusaurus, FP, Remotion, Rapier, Hermes, RN at Airbnb...

translations.zh-hant: 本週 React 動態 #113：React 原始碼解析、SOLID 原則、Remix、Docusaurus、函數式編程、Remotion、Rapier、Hermes、Airbnb 的 React Native 實踐...

segments.source_content: <!-- truncate -->

translations.zh-hant: @@untranslatable_placeholder_fc91ee08

segments.source_content: Hi everyone!

translations.zh-hant: 大家好！

segments.source_content: The newsletter now enters **summer mode: 1 edition out of 2**. I hope you enjoy your vacations 😎.

translations.zh-hant: 本電子報現進入**夏季模式：每兩週發行一期**。祝大家假期愉快 😎。

segments.source_content: We will **launch Docusaurus 2.0** very soon ([2.0-rc.1](https://twitter.com/docusaurus/status/1547616687117070338?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter) published). I will send you a special edition for the occasion. It will be the occasion to present you better this project I work on since 2+ years with Facebook. Docusaurus 2.0 is not the most famous React framework, but it remains [**very used**](https://twitter.com/sebastienlorber/status/1549083893822885888?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter) despite being in beta: twice as much as Remix or Redwood, and is progressively catching up with Gatsby. I hope I can count on you for the **ProductHunt launch** 😄.

translations.zh-hant: 我們即將**正式發布 Docusaurus 2.0**（[2.0-rc.1](https://twitter.com/docusaurus/status/1547616687117070338?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter) 已發布）。屆時將為大家發送特刊，藉此機會詳細介紹這個我與 Facebook 合作開發超過兩年的專案。Docusaurus 2.0 雖非最熱門的 React 框架，但即使處於測試階段仍[**被廣泛採用**](https://twitter.com/sebastienlorber/status/1549083893822885888?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter)：使用量是 Remix 或 Redwood 的兩倍，並逐步追趕 Gatsby。期待大家支持**ProductHunt 發布活動** 😄。

segments.source_content: This week, I want to highlight [tRPC](https://github.com/trpc/trpc?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter) to make remote calls (client/server or even server/server). Typical end-to-end solution, agile, and much easier to use than GraphQL. There is no particular event related to the lib, except a significant gain in popularity thanks to Theo and his [create-t3-app](https://github.com/t3-oss/create-t3-app?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter) framework.

translations.zh-hant: 本週特別推薦 [tRPC](https://github.com/trpc/trpc?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter)，用於實現遠端呼叫（客戶端/伺服器或伺服器/伺服器）。這是典型的端到端解決方案，具備敏捷特性，且比 GraphQL 更易上手。該函式庫近期雖無重大更新，但因 Theo 的 [create-t3-app](https://github.com/t3-oss/create-t3-app?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter) 框架而顯著提升熱度。

segments.source_content: See you soon for the Docusaurus launch 👋.

translations.zh-hant: Docusaurus 發布活動見 👋。

translations.zh-hant: 🙏 **支持本電子報：**

segments.source_content: ## React

translations.zh-hant: ## React 核心

segments.source_content: [**Reading Source Code: React**](https://alexkondov.com/readint-source-code-react/?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter)

translations.zh-hant: [**原始碼導讀：React**](https://alexkondov.com/readint-source-code-react/?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter)

segments.source_content: Alex reads the React source code and comments on several parts, taking as an entry point the mount of a React application. Interesting details about the use of prototypes, JSX, and the interaction of the (agnostic) reconciler with the DOM renderer.

translations.zh-hant: Alex 解讀 React 原始碼並針對多個部分進行註解，以 React 應用程式的掛載過程為切入點。內容包含原型使用、JSX 運作機制，以及（通用型）協調器與 DOM 渲染器互動等技術細節。

segments.source_content: [**Can We All Just Admit React Hooks Were a Bad Idea?**](https://medium.com/codex/can-we-all-just-admit-react-hooks-were-a-bad-idea-c48120c5188d?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter)

translations.zh-hant: [**我們能否都承認 React Hooks 是個壞主意？**](https://medium.com/codex/can-we-all-just-admit-react-hooks-were-a-bad-idea-c48120c5188d?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter)

segments.source_content: Amy argues that React hooks do not respect SOLID architecture principles. I don't really agree, but recognize that most of the examples found on the internet are simplified and don't necessarily highlight a good architecture.

translations.zh-hant: Amy 認為 React hooks 違反了 SOLID 架構原則。我並不完全同意，但承認網路上大多數範例都是簡化版，未必能展現良好架構。

segments.source_content: [**Applying SOLID principles in React**](https://konstantinlebedev.com/solid-in-react/?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter)

translations.zh-hant: [**在 React 中應用 SOLID 原則**](https://konstantinlebedev.com/solid-in-react/?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter)

segments.source_content: Almost a direct answer to the above article, even if the application of SOLID is more widely covered here (components + hooks). Note: don't hesitate to use the React context for dependency injection.

translations.zh-hant: 幾乎是對上述文章的直接回應，儘管此處 SOLID 的應用涵蓋更廣（元件 + hooks）。注意：別猶豫使用 React context 進行依賴注入。

segments.source_content: **Extras:**

translations.zh-hant: **額外內容:**

segments.source_content:
- 📜 [Avoid anonymous components with displayName](https://julesblom.com/writing/component-displayname?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter): sometimes React can't infer a good name for your components, which complicates the use of devtools (Context, memo, forwardRef, HOC)
- 📜 [Why Remix is not a React framework but a full stack web framework](https://andre-landgraf.dev/blog/2022-07-16_why_remix_is_not_a_react_framework_but_a_full_stack_web_framework/?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter): a well-written overview of the differences between Remix and other frameworks. Remix is full-stack and framework-agnostic.
- 📜 [Functional programming is finally going mainstream](https://github.com/readme/featured/functional-programming?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter): GitHub highlights the popularization of functional programming, in part thanks to React, Redux and hooks. I personally switched career from Scala to React after reading David Nolen's famous post. Didn't even like JS before 2014 😅
- 📜 [Why Docusaurus is a powerful documentation framework](https://blog.1password.com/docusaurus-documentation-framework/?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter): 1Password explains why Docusaurus is a good solution for their developer documentation portal. Touch various advanced topics, including site customizations, remark plugins to extend MDX/Markdown...
- 📜 [Store data in a cookie with sessions and Remix](https://jonmeyers.io/blog/store-data-in-a-cookie-with-sessions-and-remix?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter): creation of a visit counter cookie
- 📖 [Remix Deferred](https://github.com/remix-run/remix/blob/deferred/docs/guides/streaming.md?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter#using-deferred): new API under development that gives fine control over data loading tradeoffs on initial page load. Optimize for Time-to-first-byte or Cumulative Layout Shift.
- 📖 [Next.js accessibility doc improvements](https://twitter.com/nextjs/status/1549043787330375680?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter)
- 🐦 [New Preact VDOM state model](https://twitter.com/_developit/status/1549001036802625536?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter)
- 🐦 [Remix + React 18 startTransition + time-sliced hydration](https://twitter.com/ryanflorence/status/1547959632663961602?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter): Ryan Florence sharing a controversial tip. Starts interesting discussions about hydration ([Ryan Carniato](https://twitter.com/RyanCarniato/status/1549100194708353024?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter), [Andrew Clark](https://twitter.com/acdlite/status/1549109283387744256?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter)...)
- 📦 [pmndrs/react-three-rapier](https://github.com/pmndrs/react-three-rapier?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter): integrates react-three-fiber with Rapier (physics engine)
- 📦 [Remotion 3.1](https://www.remotion.dev/blog/3-1?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter): many new features! Gifs, Tailwind CSS, springs with duration, OffthreadVideo...
- 📦 [Remix 1.6.5](https://github.com/remix-run/remix/releases/tag/remix%401.6.5?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter): loader + useLoaderData TypeScript inference👌
- 📦 [Framer Motion 6.5](https://twitter.com/mattgperry/status/1547581579974696961?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter): scroll animations
- 📦 [Zustand 4.0.0-rc.2](https://twitter.com/dai_shi/status/1548685973558800384?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter): ready for production
- 📦 [Redwood 2.1](https://github.com/redwoodjs/redwood/releases/tag/v2.1.0?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter)

translations.zh-hant: @@untranslatable_placeholder_6773b78b

segments.source_content: ## 💸 Sponsors

translations.zh-hant: ## 💸 贊助商

segments.source_content: 💡 [How to sponsor this newsletter](https://thisweekinreact.com/sponsor?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter)

translations.zh-hant: 💡 [如何贊助此通訊](https://thisweekinreact.com/sponsor?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter)

segments.source_content: [**Storetasker: Freelance Shopify Devs network**](https://www.storetasker.com/become-an-expert?utm_campaign=thisweekinreact&utm_medium=thisweekinreact&utm_source=thisweekinreact)

translations.zh-hant: [**Storetasker：自由職業 Shopify 開發者網絡**](https://www.storetasker.com/become-an-expert?utm_campaign=thisweekinreact&utm_medium=thisweekinreact&utm_source=thisweekinreact)

segments.source_content: Hey! This is Tim from Storetasker. We run the best Shopify dev freelance network. I would love for you to apply if you enjoy building Shopify sites or are excited about leveraging Shopify's **cutting-edge React framework** for building custom storefronts: [**Hydrogen**](https://hydrogen.shopify.dev/?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter).

translations.zh-hant: 嘿！我是 Storetasker 的 Tim。我們經營最頂尖的 Shopify 開發自由職業者網絡。若您熱愛建構 Shopify 網站，或對運用 Shopify 的**尖端 React 框架**建構自訂店面感到興奮，誠摯邀請您申請：[**Hydrogen**](https://hydrogen.shopify.dev/?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter)。

segments.source_content: Accepted devs on the network work on a freelance basis, and we present them with great opportunities to work on some of the best Shopify brands (Alo Yoga, Chubbies, JUDY & many many more).

translations.zh-hant: 獲准加入網絡的開發者以自由職業形式工作，我們提供為頂尖 Shopify 品牌（Alo Yoga、Chubbies、JUDY 等）服務的絕佳機會。

segments.source_content: The great thing about Storetasker is that devs aren't in competition with each other - they just pick up the jobs that match their interests. Beyond that - it's a very tight-knit community.

translations.zh-hant: Storetasker 的優點在於開發者無需彼此競爭——他們只挑選符合興趣的工作。此外，這更是個緊密連結的社群。

segments.source_content: Feel free to apply directly via this [link](https://www.storetasker.com/become-an-expert?utm_campaign=thisweekinreact&utm_medium=thisweekinreact&utm_source=thisweekinreact) to join.

translations.zh-hant: 歡迎透過此[連結](https://www.storetasker.com/become-an-expert?utm_campaign=thisweekinreact&utm_medium=thisweekinreact&utm_source=thisweekinreact)直接申請加入。

segments.source_content: [**CSS Weekly Newsletter**](https://cssw.io/this-week-in-react?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter)

translations.zh-hant: [**CSS 週報**](https://cssw.io/this-week-in-react?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter)

segments.source_content: Stay up-to-date with the latest trends in CSS by getting only relevant and valuable articles and tutorials directly into your inbox. Join more than 30,000 developers and sign up now.

translations.zh-hant: 透過精選相關且有價值的 CSS 文章與教學直送收件匣，掌握最新趨勢。加入超過 30,000 名開發者行列，立即訂閱。

segments.source_content: ## React-Native

translations.zh-hant: ## React-Native

segments.source_content: [**Hermes as the Default**](https://reactnative.dev/blog/2022/07/08/hermes-as-the-default?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter)

translations.zh-hant: [**Hermes 成為預設引擎**](https://reactnative.dev/blog/2022/07/08/hermes-as-the-default?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter)

segments.source_content: The JS Hermes engine is an alternative to JSC/V8. It can help your app to start faster via a pre-compilation in bytecode. With React-Native 0.70 (now in [release candidate](https://github.com/facebook/react-native/releases/tag/v0.70.0-rc.0?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter)), Hermes is enabled by default. Michael shares various benchmarks from the open-source app Mattermost. The Hermes distribution mode has changed to avoid ABI incompatibility issues. Missing Intl APIs have been added on iOS. Upcoming support for BigInt and WeakRef.

translations.zh-hant: Hermes JS 引擎是 JSC/V8 的替代方案，透過位元組碼預編譯加速應用啟動。React-Native 0.70（現為[發布候選版](https://github.com/facebook/react-native/releases/tag/v0.70.0-rc.0?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter)）已預設啟用 Hermes。Michael 分享開源應用 Mattermost 的多元效能測試。Hermes 分發模式已調整以避免 ABI 相容問題，iOS 補齊缺失的 Intl API，並將支援 BigInt 與 WeakRef。

segments.source_content: [**What working at Airbnb during its React Native era taught me about web3**](https://medium.com/@devinabbott/what-working-at-airbnb-during-its-react-native-era-taught-me-about-web3-6d34d855d892?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter)

translations.zh-hant: [**我在 Airbnb 的 React Native 時代工作所學到的關於 web3 的經驗**](https://medium.com/@devinabbott/what-working-at-airbnb-during-its-react-native-era-taught-me-about-web3-6d34d855d892?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter)

segments.source_content: Devin goes over the history of React-Native at Airbnb and the very nuanced decision to sunset it He makes the interesting parallel with web3. In the long term, technology potential wins over the pain of early adopters.

translations.zh-hant: Devin 回顧了 React-Native 在 Airbnb 的歷史，以及決定停止使用它的細微考量。他將此與 web3 做了有趣的類比。從長遠來看，技術的潛力勝過早期採用者的痛苦。

segments.source_content: **Extras:**

translations.zh-hant: **其他資訊：**

segments.source_content:
- 📜 [Ionic - Announcing Portals for React Native](https://ionicframework.com/blog/announcing-portals-for-react-native/?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter): allows an integration of WebView Ionic experiences in a React-Native app. Paid product.
- 🎙️ [React-Native-Radio #242 - Inspecting React Native 0.69](https://reactnativeradio.com/episodes/rnr-242-inspecting-react-native-069?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter)
- 🎙️ [The React Native Show #14 - React Native Paper v.5](https://www.callstack.com/podcasts/react-native-paper-v-5-update-overview?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter)
- 📦 [Vision Camera 2.14](https://twitter.com/mrousavy/status/1548953154993127426?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter): can now chain frame processors
- 📦 [expo vscode 0.8](https://twitter.com/cedricvanputten/status/1549051333595971585?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter): JSON config autocomplete 👍
- 📦 [expo-music-picker](https://github.com/barthap/expo-music-picker?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter)
- 📦 [react-native-iconic](https://github.com/nandorojo/react-native-iconic?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter)
- 🧑‍🎨 [React-Native-Skia + Expo web demo](https://twitter.com/Baconbrix/status/1547974280670875648?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter)
- 🧑‍🎨 [Instagram iOS page transitions demo](https://twitter.com/enesozt_/status/1549049433148403712?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter)

translations.zh-hant:
- 📜 [Ionic - 宣佈推出 React Native Portals](https://ionicframework.com/blog/announcing-portals-for-react-native/?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter)：允許在 React-Native 應用程式中整合 WebView Ionic 體驗。付費產品。

segments.source_content: ## Other

translations.zh-hant: ## 其他

segments.source_content: [**Vite 3**](https://vitejs.dev/blog/announcing-vite3.html?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter)

translations.zh-hant: [**Vite 3**](https://vitejs.dev/blog/announcing-vite3.html?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter)

segments.source_content: Vite quickly became a reference in the frontend ecosystem. Today, it is a very good alternative to Create-React-App, with a much faster DX, and some React meta-frameworks are also using it (Storybook, Hydrogen...). v3 comes with a lot of changes, a new doc, starters for various frameworks (including React), improvements on global imports, a new doc... See also the [ViteConf](https://viteconf.org/?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter) conference in October.

translations.zh-hant: Vite 在前端生態系統中迅速成為參考標準。如今，它是 Create-React-App 的一個非常好的替代品，具有更快的開發者體驗（DX），並且一些 React 元框架也在使用它（如 Storybook、Hydrogen...）。v3 帶來了許多變化，包括新的文件、適用於各種框架（包括 React）的入門套件、全域導入的改進，以及新的文件... 另請參閱十月舉行的 [ViteConf](https://viteconf.org/?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter) 會議。
